title: Project: AI & Aging Research
content: Exploring the intersection of artificial intelligence and aging research, focusing on predictive models. Keywords: AI, machine learning, elderly care, health tech, gerontology.

title: Deep Dive: Custom Domains
content: A comprehensive guide to setting up custom domains for your projects and websites. Topics include DNS configuration, hosting, SSL certificates, and domain management.

title: About Sen's World
content: Learn more about Sen, an AI & Bio enthusiast studying at BUPT. Based in Beijing. Interests include artificial intelligence, biology, technology, and personal projects.

title: Contact Sen
content: How to reach Sen. Email: hi@yitumulin.com, Telegram, WeChat QR code available. Get in touch for collaborations or just to say hi.
